answers.answer: I hope you get what you want. I wanted to be team pink but im team blue. Im still excited and can't wait until he's here. I have a doctor's appointment later today and I have a feeling I'm going to be tested for gestational diabetes and im so not excited. I hate the way the juice taste and the hour long wait for them to draw blood.
Thanks girls n i hate dat test

question: So i got ma ultrasound in a hr n i find out wat im havin i hope im team pink this time around but really i just want a healthy baby i waited so long now its da day yayyyy
title: Ultrasound today
